radiographic_examinations.findings: Hepatomegaly, a normal spleen and kidneys, and no masses.

radiographic_examinations.date: Two and a half weeks before admission
radiographic_examinations.findings: Hepatomegaly with multiple hypodense nodules in the spleen and liver.
radiographic_examinations.changes_over_time: Follow-up CT two months later showed nearly complete resolution of the lesions in the liver and spleen and resolution of the abdominal lymphadenopathy.
